text: Sporting Clube de Portugal, commonly called Sporting CP or Sporting is a football club from Lisbon, Portugal. They play in the Primeira Liga, the top division of Portuguese football. They play their home games at the Estádio José Alvalade. ==Honours== ===Domestic competitions=== * Primeira Liga : Winners (18): 1940–41, 1943–44, 1946–47, 1947–48, 1948–49, 1950–51, 1951–52, 1952–53, 1953–54, 1957–58, 1961–62, 1965–66, 1969–70, 1973–74, 1979–80, 1981–82, 1999–2000, 2001–02 * Taça de Portugal : Winners (17): 1940–41, 1944–45, 1945–46, 1947–48, 1953–54, 1962–63, 1970–71, 1972–73, 1973–74, 1977–78, 1981–82, 1994–95, 2001–02, 2006–07, 2007–08, 2014–15, 2018–19 * Taça da Liga : Winners (2): 2017–18, 2018–19 * Supertaça Cândido de Oliveira : Winners (8): 1982, 1987, 1995, 2000, 2002, 2007, 2008, 2015 * Campeonato de Portugal : Winners (4): 1922–23, 1933–34, 1935–36, 1937–38 ===European competitions=== * European Cup Winners' Cup : Winners (1): 1963–64 ==References== ==Other websites== * *Sporting CP at UEFA Category:1900s establishments in Portugal Category:1906 establishments in Europe Category:Portuguese football clubs Category:Organizations based in Lisbon
title: Sporting CP
